title: The Fate of a Dark Matter Theory Hinges on These Unidentified X-Rays
description: Despite decades of searching, no one has yet cracked the mystery of dark matter. One hypothesis to explain it relies on strange x-rays emanating from distant galaxies and galaxy clusters, but a new paper appears to rule out dark matter as producing these myst…
